results.title: Ron the zookeeper
results.brief_description:
Claymation story about Sushi, the last male grey panda and his reluctance to be a sperm donator to save his species from extinction.
WARNING: Contains sex scenes, coarse language and adult themes

results.title: Rain in the sun
results.brief_description: In some regions of Japan a sunshower is known as a “Kitsune no Yomein” which literally means “Foxes’ Wedding”. This simplistic poetic 2-d animated tale illustrates the legend behind “Kitsune no Yomein”. Introduction in Japanese language with English subtitles.

results.title: A Matter of preference
results.brief_description:
Humorous 2-d animated tale of old Harold and his matter of preference - after all he knows best doesn’t he!
Music - “Sisi” written by Rob Gador performed by Hot Club Swing.

results.title: LARP = Live action role playing
results.brief_description: Mini doco about the game of live action role playing. Includes revealing interviews with several individuals about their character(s) and their role(s) in the game and why LARP plays such an important part in their life.
